name: HOTOR Travel Toiletry Bag - Hanging Toiletry Bag for Women & Men, Makeup Bag/Big Comparment, Waterproof for Travel Accessories, Travel Essentials, Medium, Black
short_description: SPACIOUS YET COMPACT: HOTOR hanging toiletry bag strikes a perfect balance between spaciousness and compact design, measuring 11.4 x 9 x 3.35 inches when closed and expanding to a generous 37 x 9 inches when opened. This thoughtful sizing allows for the organization of large travel essentials such as shampoo, lotions, face wash, toothpaste, toothbrushes, hairbrushes, and daily makeup. Its medium size is particularly suitable for overnight or short trips.

MULTIPLE STORAGE COMPARTMENTS: Catering to the needs of women travelers, this travel toiletry bag for women boasts four main compartments, three of which are equipped with zippers for secure storage. The practical transparent pockets enable easy access to specific items without fully opening the bag. The innovative leakproof PVC pockets effectively segregate wet items from dry ones, accommodating a range of essentials from vitamins and makeup products to electronic devices and charging cables.

STURDY HOOK DESIGN: Featuring a premium metal hook, the HOTOR cosmetic travel bag offers the convenience of hanging from a towel rack, coat hook, or any available space. This not only showcases your toiletries and cosmetics for easy accessibility but also saves valuable bathroom counter space. The sturdy metal hook is designed with a retractable feature, allowing it to be neatly stowed away when not in use.

USER-FRIENDLY DESIGNS: Designed with user convenience in mind, this travel bag for toiletries incorporates supporting pads to maintain its shape and provide excellent protection for the items inside. Elastic straps keep toiletry bottles upright, preventing liquids from escaping and causing a mess. The reinforced zippers enhance durability and ensure smooth opening, adding to the overall user-friendly experience.

WATERPROOF & MULTIPURPOSE: Perfect for various scenarios, this hanging toiletry bag for women includes leakproof and waterproof PVC pockets suitable for bathroom use. Its compact, sturdy, portable, and lightweight nature makes it an ideal companion for business trips, travel, gym sessions, camping, and home use. The added convenience of a grab handle ensures easy portability, making it a travel must-have travel.

name: PACKISM Clear Makeup Bag - TSA Approved Toiletry Bag for Carry-on & Checked Luggage, Water Resistant Car Storage Organizer with Reinforced Seams
product_description: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS Q: ARE THESE BAGS TSA APPROVED FOR CARRY-ON? A: The Medium bag (7.5 x 2.2 x 5.5 inches) follows the TSA 3-1-1 liquids rule for carry-on luggage. The Large bag (9.7 x 3.2 x 6.5 inches) is designed for checked luggage or larger items that do not need to pass through the liquids screening. Q: CAN I USE THIS AS A CAR CONSOLE ORGANIZER? A: Yes. Both the flexible PVC and structured versions fit in most center consoles and glove boxes—ideal for sunglasses, charging cables, and other small essentials. Q: HOW DO I REMOVE THE PLASTIC SMELL UPON ARRIVAL? A: The bag comes with a deodorizing packet. If a scent remains, we recommend wiping the bag with a damp cloth and letting it air out in a ventilated area for 24 to 48 hours. Q: IS THE MATERIAL HARD OR SOFT? A: The soft PVC version is made of thick, flexible PVC, so it’s soft and collapsible. The structured version includes a built-in hard frame with PU leather–trimmed edges. Q: IS THE LEATHER REAL OR SYNTHETIC? A: This bag is crafted from high-quality PU (Polyurethane) leather, offering a durable, water-resistant, and cruelty-free alternative with a stylish textured finish.
